original_title: TOMORROW X TOGETHER WORLD TOUR  ‘ACT : SWEET MIRAGE’
overview: ACT:SWEET MIRAGE is the second world tour by South Korea boy band Tomorrow X Together, following their fifth extended play (EP) and start of a new chapter in the TXT discography—The Name Chapter: Temptation. The tour began on March 25 in Seoul, South Korea, together with online live streaming on the Weverse platform.
title: TOMORROW X TOGETHER WORLD TOUR  ‘ACT : SWEET MIRAGE’
